title: mAmava kalayEha
sahitya:
mAmava kalayEha mudA


caraNam 1    mAmsa vAsadimayE lalanAngE mA mA satatam vihara hrda
    caraNam 2    jIvitamahaha ghaTAdayi bhinnAnnIramiva shravatIha sadA
    caraNam 3    yadi yatasE na shubhArthamidAnIm prabhavati yatnO jagati kadA
    caraNam 4    ayatanE shikina bata dIptE kUpakrtih kvacanu bhavati kadA
    caraNam 5    yOjya paTala pankaja sarucA mAna samAmbhujanAbha padA
